channel.title: Changing a players stand/run/attack emote?
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering which class I would need to look in to change the run, stand, attack, etc. emotes?
I'm trying to add shapeshifting, and when players transform they're all screwed up lol.
Thanks. :rolleyes:
